Uses of Class
org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.RegionProjection

  • Packages that use RegionProjection 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased
    Contains column based decision tree algorithms.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.caches
    Contains cache configurations for columnbased decision tree trainer with some related logic.
    org.apache.ignite.ml.trees.trainers.columnbased.vectors
    Contains feature containers needed by column based decision tree trainers.
